thought: To craft a conduit, I need to place 8 nautilus shells in the crafting grid in a pattern with a heart of the sea in the center. I have 8 nautilus shells at slot 31, and I will first move one of them to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1
